section.div: Favorites genres: Fantasy, Action, Comedy, Adventure

div.div: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

The fourth season of Xian Wang De Richang Shenghuo. The monks used all available resources to pursue the three thousand ways of heaven throughout the era of popular scientific culture in order to catch a glimpse of the reality of heaven. The modern sword master Yi Jianchuan and his younger brother, the wicked sword god Chen Nanxuan, went in a completely different direction to seek the ultimate swordsmanship, one of the three thousand heavenly ways. Wang Ling is concerned with which heavenly road to follow today in order to have a serene daily existence, while the rest of the world is concerned with how to nurture a heavenly path. (Source: Bilibili)

Dragons reign terror over the earth, sea and sky. If sworn dragon hunters like Ragna are to have any hope of dealing death to these seemingly invincible, fire-breathing beasts, they must find a way to level the odds. Ragna teams up with a mysterious man named Crimson who has likewise sworn to stand against the dragons menacing the world. But although Crimson’s motivations may be mysterious, his goal and Ragna’s perfectly align, and together they’ll fight to vanquish the dragons once and for all. (Source: Sentai Filmworks) Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of ~47 minutes.
